The Lackawanna Cut-off railway will improve travel times for hundreds of thousands of travelers across New Jersey and will bring significant benefits to our families & our communities — reducing congestion on our roads boosting tourism and helping grow our local economies.
I also spoke with @user board members to push them to begin work. We got it across the finish line!

I called on @user to put aside bureaucratic stalling and immediately move forward with investment to restore the Roseville Tunnel fix culverts and return quality rail service to Sussex and Warren Counties.
